channel.title: Help with interfaces
channel.description: how do i make it so when people go to a certain place the interface pops up and it says certain things and i can walk with it up?

item.title: Help with interfaces
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Erm, I’m not sure just pulled it out of my head but it would be something like this I guess;

if(absY >= yyyy && absX <= xxxx) showInterface(xxxx); Or something like that, maybe need to change the >'s and <'s and for the showInterface(xxxx); put the interface number I guess.

Then you need to edit the interface but don’t know how yet.

Read full topic
